column2: Chronus Mentor service handling Customer data will be hosted in AWS Virtual Private Cloud which is protected using advanced security features of AWS such as security groups (aka firewalls) and network access control lists. Inbound and outbound traffic filtering is done at both server and subnet level. Only HTTPS, HTTP, SSH and SMTP protocols will be enabled appropriately.
